programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Will Smith and son Jaden Smith as father and son astronauts who crash land on Earth which has been abandoned for a millennium. Together they face a perilous journey to signal for help on Earth's hostile surface M Night Shyamalan - Director Will Smith - Cypher Raige Jaden Smith - Kitai Raige Sophie Okonedo - Faia Raige Zoë Kravitz - Senshi Raige Glenn Morshower - Commander Velan David Denman - Private McQuarrie Isabelle Fuhrman - Rayna.

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: Science-fiction drama starring Amy Adams and Jeremy Renner. After 12 alien spacecraft land in locations around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is called in to try to decipher the visitors' language and open a line of communication. Do they come in peace or is humankind on the brink of war Denis Villeneuve - Director Amy Adams - Dr Louise Banks Jeremy Renner - Ian Donnelly Forest Whitaker - Colonel Weber Michael Stuhlbarg - Agent Halpern Mark O'Brien (2) - Captain Marks Ma Tzi - General Shang.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Jan 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Crime/detective, Mystery, Thriller ║ 2017 ║ 12
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller based on the popular ital}anime and manga series, starring Scarlett Johansson. Following a terrible accident, the brain of Major Mira Killian is transplanted into a robotic body and she is transformed into a super-soldier tasked with fighting terrorism. But as memories of Major's past life begin to emerge, she suspects that not all is as it seems Rupert Sanders - Director Scarlett Johansson - Major Pilou Asbaek - Batou Takeshi Kitano - Daisuke Aramaki Juliette Binoche - Dr Ouelet Michael Pitt - Kuze Anamaria Marinca - Dr Dahlin Peter Ferdinando - Cutter Chin Han - Togusa Danusia Samal - Ladriya Michael Wincott - Dr Osmond Rila Fukushima - Red robed geisha.

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2003 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller directed by John Woo and based on a short story by Philip K Dick, starring Ben Affleck, Aaron Eckhart and Uma Thurman. Computer genius Michael Jennings undertakes the last in a series of lucrative, top-secret corporate projects that require his memory to be wiped on completion. Emerging with no recollection of the past three years, he's baffled to discover he's forfeited his pay in favour of an envelope of apparently worthless items. To make matters worse, his previous employers are intent on killing him John Woo - Director Ben Affleck - Michael Jennings Aaron Eckhart - Rethrick Uma Thurman - Rachel Porter Paul Giamatti - Shorty Colm Feore - Wolfe Joe Morton - Agent Dodge Michael C Hall - Agent Klein Ivana Milicevic - Maya / Rachel Callum Keith Rennie - Jude.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Rowan Atkinson, and featuring John Malkovich. When the crown jewels are stolen from under the nose of the authorities, bumbling secret agent Johnny English is assigned to retrieve them and capture the culprits. The unfortunate spy is soon in over his head when he discovers that the theft is part of an evil plan to seize the British throne Peter Howitt - Director Rowan Atkinson - Johnny English Natalie Imbruglia - Lorna Campbell Ben Miller - Bough John Malkovich - Pascal Sauvage Tim Pigott-Smith - Pegasus Kevin McNally - Prime Minister Oliver Ford Davies - Archbishop of Canterbury Douglas McFerran - Carlos Vendetta Steve Nicolson - Dieter Klein Greg Wise - Agent One.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Rowan Atkinson. When a plot comes to light to assassinate the Chinese premier, hapless operative Johnny English, currently honing his combat skills in a remote region of Tibet, is hurriedly called back to MI7 Oliver Parker - Director Rowan Atkinson - Johnny English Gillian Anderson - Pamela Thornton Dominic West - Simon Ambrose Rosamund Pike - Kate Sumner Daniel Kaluuya - Agent Tucker Richard Schiff - Fisher Tim McInnerny - Patch Quartermain Mark Ivanir - Karlenko.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Spy action thriller, the first sequel to The Bourne Identity, starring Matt Damon. programme.title: Men in Black
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 1997 ║ PG
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy starring Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith. When a New York police officer is recruited by a top-secret agency that monitors alien activity he finds himself in a race against time to save the Earth from destruction Barry Sonnenfeld - Director Tommy Lee Jones - K Will Smith - J Linda Fiorentino - Laurel Vincent D'Onofrio - Edgar Rip Torn - Zed Tony Shalhoub - Jeebs Siobhan Fallon - Beatrice Mike Nussbaum - Gentle Rosenberg Jonathan Gries - Van driver Sergio Calderon - Jose Carel Struycken - Arquillian Fredric Lehne - INS Agent Janus.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Sci Fi, Mystery ║ 2002 ║ PG
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy sequel starring Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones. When evil alien queen Serleena threatens Earth's safety, former intergalactic secret agent Kay holds the secret to her destruction. However, Kay is now living a civilian life as a post-office worker and his memory of the past has been erased. Can his former partner Jay persuade him to rejoin the sharp-suited Men in Black and save the world Barry Sonnenfeld - Director Tommy Lee Jones - Agent Kay Will Smith - Agent Jay Lara Flynn Boyle - Serleena Johnny Knoxville - Scrad / Charlie Rosario Dawson - Laura Tony Shalhoub - Jeebs Rip Torn - Zed Patrick Warburton - Agent Tee Martha Stewart - Martha Stewart Michael Jackson (3) - Agent M Peter Graves (2) - Peter Graves Barry Sonnenfeld - Neuralyzed father.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Jan 2025

programme.title: The Cinema List: Musicals
programme.desc: It is time to get musical with this all-singing, all-dancing list of movies. From Wonka to La La Land, get ready to tap your feet along to the beat.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Family, Sport, Lifestyle, Education, Science And Technology ║ 2006 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Sports comedy starring Jack Black. Kindly cook Ignacio concocts a brilliant solution to the financial hardship of the Mexican monastery where he has grown up. programme.title: The Meg
programme.sub-title: Action, Thriller, Drama, Horror, Sci Fi ║ 2018 ║ 12
programme.desc: Action horror thriller starring Jason Statham and Li Bingbing. After failing to save the crew of an imperilled submarine, deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is unfairly branded a drunk and a coward. Five years later, he spies an opportunity to prove everybody wrong when he is approached to aid a team of researchers in their fight against a giant prehistoric shark Jon Turteltaub - Director Jason Statham - Jonas Taylor Li Bingbing - Suyin Rainn Wilson - Jack Morris Ruby Rose - Jaxx Winston Chao - Dr Zhang Page Kennedy - DJ Jessica McNamee - Lori Olafur Darri Olafsson - The Wall Robert Taylor (4) - Dr Heller Sophia Cai - Meiying Masi Oka - Toshi Cliff Curtis - James \Mac\ Mackreides.

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. Horror, starring Joely Richardson, Neil Linpow, Sadie Soverall and Harry Cadby Matthias Hoene - Director Joely Richardson - Mama Neil Linpow - Jack Sadie Soverall - Maisy Harry Cadby - Matty Roger Ajogbe - Pa.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A man buys his pregnant wife a vintage doll, which places their lives in jeopardy. Members of a Satanic cult have their eyes on the antique toy, and break into their house to prepare a ritual that will transform the harmless plaything into a terrifying monster. Horror spin-off from The Conjuring, starring Annabelle Wallis and Ward Horton John R Leonetti - Director Annabelle Wallis - Mia Ward Horton - John Tony Amendola - Father Perez Alfre Woodard - Evelyn Kerry O'Malley - Sharon Higgins Brian Howe - Pete Higgins Eric Ladin - Detective Clarkin Ivar Brogger - Dr Burgher Keira Daniels - Young Annabelle Higgins.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Horror, Action ║ 1992 ║ 15
programme.desc: Science-fiction thriller starring Jeff Fahey and Pierce Brosnan. Government scientist Lawrence Angelo discovers that he can enhance the intelligence of chimpanzees using drugs and computer technology. programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. programme.title: Coup!

In 1918, as the flu pandemic rages, the mysterious Floyd Monk arrives at the isolated estate of the Horton family, claiming to be their new chef. programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Berbatov
programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Fletcher
programme.desc: Helen and Sam caught up with former Manchester United and Scotland midfielder Darren Fletcher. Fletch gives the podcast team a fascinating insight into his career and his current and future plans.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Macari
programme.desc: Lou Macari speaks to Helen and Sam about the work he does at his homeless shelter, playing with Best, Law & Charlton, and the heart-wrenching story of why he'll always have a soft spot for Solskjaer.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Scholes
programme.desc: The United Legend talks to the Pod about the heartbreak of missing out on the Champions League Final, his retirement U-turn and those 'mistimed' tackles.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Cantona
programme.desc: The King talks to the Pod about his famous 'seagulls following the trawler' press conference, his unique celebration against Sunderland and the meaning of life.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Saha
programme.desc: The Frenchman opens up about his struggles with injury, Sir Alex reducing him to tears and how he forced through his transfer from Fulham.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Schmeichel
programme.desc: The Great Dane talks to Helen, Maysie and Alex Bruce about his explosive bust-up with Sir Alex, the historic Treble in 1999, and how he regrets leaving the club.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Whiteside
programme.desc: The Pod team set up in Norman's local where he recalls tales with Bryan Robson & Paul McGrath, and takes the guys back to his incredible rise to fame at the age of 17.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Evra
programme.desc: Uncle Pat joins the Pod in a feature-length episode where he tells the emotional story of his route into football - right the way through to retirement, with lots of tears and laughter along the way.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Nani
programme.desc: Former United winger Nani joins the Pod via video chat all the way from Orlando, where they look back on some of the iconic and strange moments in his time at Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Yorke
programme.desc: United Legend Dwight Yorke joins us from his home in Dubai to look back on his incredible career, and how an early childhood car accident may have influenced his outlook on life.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Robin van Persie
programme.desc: RVP talks to the Pod about facing United with Arsenal in that famous 8-2 victory, his joy at finally winning the Premier League, and what it was like to work with Louis van Gaal.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast: Phil Neville
programme.desc: The former United defender looks back on his Premier League career including a flashpoint with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Forlan
programme.desc: The cult hero talks to the Pod about his iconic goals against Liverpool and the time he played without a shirt!

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Rashford
programme.desc: The United and England forward looks back on an incredible year both on and off the pitch. We hear everything from the nerve-wracking penalty in Paris to forcing two UK government U-turns.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Mark Hughes
programme.desc: Sparky walks us through his many successful years at Old Trafford and the thinking behind his decision to manage Man City years later.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Ruud van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: The goalscoring machine looks back on his career; how a move to Old Trafford nearly fell apart, his rivalry with Arsenal, and training with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1993
programme.desc: We revisit the 1993 final between Marseille and AC Milan at Munich's Olympiastadion. The occasion was later overshadowed by one of the biggest scandals in the sport's history.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1994
programme.desc: A look back at the extraordinary 1994 final at the Olympic Stadium in Athens between Fabio Capello's AC Milan and Barcelona, managed by Johan Cruyff and dubbed the 'Dream Team'.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1995
programme.desc: We revisit the 1995 final in Vienna between Louis van Gaal's Ajax and AC Milan. A star-studded Ajax team featured Edwin van der Sar, Ronald and Frank de Boer, and Edgar Davids.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1996
programme.desc: We revisit the 1996 final between Ajax and Juventus in Rome. Juve's talented side included Didier Deschamps, Antonio Conte and Gianluca Vialli - all at the height of their powers.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1998
programme.desc: Real Madrid went in search of their seventh European Cup title when they faced Juventus in the 1998 final in Amsterdam. The Serie A winners featured a 25-year-old Zinedine Zidane.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2001
programme.desc: We revisit the dramatic 2000/01 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Valencia at the San Siro in Milan. Bayern were chasing their first title in a quarter-century.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2003
programme.desc: We revisit the 2002/03 UEFA Champions League final between Juventus and AC Milan at Old Trafford. Paolo Maldini aimed to lift the trophy as captain, just as his father did in 1963.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2004
programme.desc: We revisit the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League final between Monaco and Porto in Gelsenkirchen. Jose Mourinho would leave Porto to take over at Chelsea just days later.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2007
programme.desc: We rewind back to the 2006/07 UEFA Champions League final at the Olympic Stadium in Athens as AC Milan looked to avenge their defeat two years previously against the Reds.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2009
programme.desc: A look back at the 2009 UEFA Champions League final between Barcelona and Man Utd in Rome. United were bidding to become the first team to defend the trophy in the modern era.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2010
programme.desc: We revisit the 2010 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Inter Milan at the Bernabeu. Jose Mourinho was looking to become the third man to win it with two clubs.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2013
programme.desc: We revisit the all-German 2013 UEFA Champions League final between Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich at Wembley. Bayern had lost two finals in three years.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2015
programme.desc: We revisit the enthralling 2014/15 UEFA Champions League final between Juventus and Barcelona in Berlin. Barcelona were chasing their third Champions League title in six years.

programme.title: Barcelona v Man Utd 1994/95
programme.desc: We revisit the 1994/95 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Barcelona and Man Utd at the Nou Camp. Johan Cruyff's 'Dream Team' featured Hristo Stoichkov and Romario.

programme.title: Man Utd v Barcelona 1998/99
programme.desc: We revisit the 1998/99 UEFA Champions League group stage epic between Man Utd and Barcelona at Old Trafford. This end-to-end game featured six goals, two penalties and a red card.
